short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyze and export alt text of images on webpages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Image Alt Text Analyzer: Your Essential Tool for SEO and Web Accessibility

Enhance your website analysis and accessibility efforts with the Image Alt Text Analyzer extension. This powerful tool allows you to instantly view and export alt text information for all images on any webpage.

Key Features:
- One-Click Analysis: Simply click the extension icon to reveal alt text for all images on the current page.
- Visual Overlay: Alt text is displayed directly over images for easy reading and quick assessment.
- Export Functionality: Download a comprehensive CSV report of all images, their URLs, alt text, and dimensions.
- Customizable Display: Adjust overlay color, text color, and font size to suit your preferences.
- Privacy-Focused: All analysis is performed locally in your browser. No data is collected or transmitted.

Perfect for:
- SEO Professionals: Quickly audit image alt text to improve search engine optimization.
- Web Developers: Ensure proper implementation of alt text for better accessibility.
- Content Creators: Verify that your images have appropriate alt text descriptions.
- Accessibility Advocates: Raise awareness about the importance of alt text in web design.
- Digital Marketers: Improve the overall quality and searchability of web content.

How It Works:
1. Navigate to any webpage you want to analyze.
2. Click the Image Alt Text Analyzer icon in your browser.
3. Instantly see alt text displayed over each image on the page.
4. Use the export feature to download a detailed report for further analysis.

Improve your website's SEO performance and accessibility with Image Alt Text Analyzer. Download now and start optimizing your web content!

Note: This extension respects your privacy. It only activates when you click the icon and doesn't collect or transmit any personal data.

We value your feedback! Please rate and review our extension to help us improve and reach more users.
